post.title: New Spring Rebirth Gleam Giveaway - Hellcase Blog
post.excerpt: Improvement is what all gamers strive for and Hellcase is here to help you with that. With our new giveaway on Gleam feature, you can get a valuable skin as a prize by completing simple tasks. Let’s find out more about this amazing opportunity. In ar
post.content_html:
Improvement is what all gamers strive for and Hellcase is here to help you with that. With our new giveaway on Gleam feature, you can get a valuable skin as a prize by completing simple tasks. Let’s find out more about this amazing opportunity.

In article you will find:

  • What’s new?
  • All info about Spring Rebirth Giveaway
  • Flip Knife | Gamma Doppler (FN)
  • Navaja Knife | Case Hardened (MW)
  • AWP | Duality (FN)
  • AK-47 | Nightwish (MW)
  • USP-S | Monster Mashup (MW)
  • Desert Eagle | Midnight Storm (WW)
  • M4A4 | Buzz Kill (MW)
  • To Wrap Up!

What’s new?

Our giveaway is based on the Gleam service. You can access the current event by clicking on the “giveaway” button at the top of the Hellcase page or by clicking here to check the active giveaway. The user needs to log in to the giveaway page. Here you can also see the period of the giveaway, the number of entries, and the list of tasks.

For completing tasks, you get a certain number of entries. It all depends on the complexity of the task. Entries increase your chances of winning the giveaway, however, the selection is still random.

We are giving away valuable CS:GO items. For example, you can become the owner of a knife, rifle, or pistol skin.

All info about Spring Rebirth giveaway

Spring Rebirth giveaway is an incredible giveaway with valuable prizes for CS:GO players. We are giving away seven types of skins with a total value of $3,000. Overall, the prize pool consists of 100 prizes for 100 winners and Spring Rebirth giveaway will run from March 3 to March 23 (until 10 AM GMT). Let’s take a look at each skin from this giveaway.

Flip Knife | Gamma Doppler (FN)

As part of the giveaway, a winner can receive a valuable Flip Knife | Gamma Doppler for free. We give this prize to only one of the winners. The cost of this knife skin is so high that it is totally worth entering the competition to get your hands on it.

This skin has a Covert rarity and a float value ranging from 0.00 to 0.08. The skin is available in only two exteriors – Factory New and Minimal Wear. This means that it is an extremely rare and valuable item. But, you can get Flip Knife | Gamma Doppler via giveaway in a Factory New exterior without any visible costs. Isn’t it cool?

Navaja Knife | Case Hardened (MW)

Do you dream of getting Navaja Knife | Case Hardened for free? This is quite real since we are giving away one such skin. This knife skin with a small but sharp blade has an unusual design – a marble handle and a blade covered with blue, yellow, and purple spots.

It belongs to the category of skins with a Covert rarity costing over $100. Players can use this item in all exteriors. You have a chance to obtain Navaja Knife | Case Hardened via giveaway in Minimal Wear condition.

AWP | Duality (FN)

Five winners of our Spring Rebirth giveaway can get AWP | Duality for free. This is a sniper rifle skin with a sophisticated, bright design in pink shades. On the body of the weapon, there is an image of a snake surrounded by a floral ornament. Don’t miss such a great opportunity to get a Factory New version of AWP | Duality in the giveaway.

AK-47 | Nightwish (MW)

There are eight free AK-47 | Nightwish skins for giveaway winners. This is a skin with an awesome design in neon shades. The skin has a Covert rarity and a float value ranging from 0.00 to 1.00. Wouldn’t it be cool to become an owner of a Minimal Wear version of AK-47 | Nightwish through our giveaway?

USP-S | Monster Mashup (MW)

We are giving away twenty USP-S | Monster Mashup for free . This is a pistol skin with a unique design. There is a green monster that resembles a crocodile on the barrel of a weapon. The item has a Classified rarity. Participate in our event to get a Minimal Wear version of USP-S | Monster Mashup through the giveaway.

Desert Eagle | Midnight Storm (WW)

Hellcase gives away twenty-five Desert Eagle | Midnight Storm for free. This is a pistol skin with a minimalist design in blue shades. Item has an Industrial Grade. It is used by pro players such as abe, hatz, and hampus. You can also replenish your inventory with a Well-Worn version of Desert Eagle | Midnight Storm thanks to our giveaway .

M4A4 | Buzz Kill (MW)

Finally, forty winners of our giveaway get M4A4 | Buzz Kill (MW) for free. This is a full-auto assault rifle skin with a discreet design in yellow shades. The skin is a rare drop, as it has a Covert rarity. Item has a float value from 0.00 to 0.70, so players can use it in all conditions. You can win a Minimal Wear version of M4A4 | Buzz Kill in our giveaway .

To Wrap Up!

Who doesn’t like getting prizes? For CS:GO players, there is nothing more thrilling than getting their hands on some of the rarest and most valuable skins in the game. So, why not take part in the Spring Rebirth giveaway. Do not be upset if you are late with participation in this giveaway, follow this link to join a new, no less interesting one.

We are giving away valuable skins that will surely enhance your gaming experience. Collect as many entries as possible to increase your chances of winning the giveaways.
